titles.title: 320 I'm Not Ashamed To Own My Lord (easy meter)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm not ashamed
To own my Lord
Or to defend His cause
Maintain the honor
Of His Word
The glory of His cross

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus my God
I know His name
His Name is all my trust
Nor will He put
My soul to shame
Nor let my hope be lost

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Firm as His throne
His promise stands
And He can well secure
What I've committed
To his hands
Till the decisive hour

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Then will He own
My worthless name
Before His Father's face
And in the
New Jerusalem
Appoint my soul a place
